Articles.Content:
It\'s plain and simple.

With the new update, you can leave your command module and walk around! Meaning you can also interact with other objects in hilarious ways, including things like jumping onto platforms, climbing onto flying planes in mid-air, parkour on a rocket, and much more.

Those are only of the few things I have made so far, but I want to see people share ideas because we all know that we love to watch kerbals slam into the pavement with a spectacular explosion in the background.

My entry is an EVA crash-landing and a somewhat diving board thing, at 15:10 and 18:40, respectively.

Also, please share any tips for configurations regarding the kerbals, because I want them to survive larger booms.

So... what are you waiting for!? 8)
I\'m waiting for 0.16 to work on a mac. :\'( > ;P
